name: FriendWoof
0:
”Alexa, open Friend Woof”
”Alexa, start Friend Woof”
”Alexa, launch Friend Woof”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: friend woof
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A fun skill that will allow you to adopt a four-legged friend among the many types of dogs available and play with him. It will obey all your commands, it will be very pleasant to use in family, among friends and especially if you have a dog!!

To open the skill just say:

"Alexa, open friend woof"
"Alexa, start friend woof"
"Alexa, launch friend woof"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
